title: Forescout Threat Protection
description: This dashboard provides insights into threat protection activities, including suspicious connections, scans, lockdowns, blocks, and email worm detections.

definition.content:
This dashboard offers a comprehensive summary of threat protection activities, including suspicious connection attempts, scan events, lockdown actions, block events, and email worm detections.

For more information, see the [Forescout Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/forescout/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
Provides insights into endpoints that were previously flagged as suspicious and are attempting to access the network again.
Provides insights into endpoints performing repeated probes within a defined time period.
Provides insights into malicious activity detected by Forescout appliances.
Provides insights into blocked network packets from source to destination.
Provides insights into unusual email activity related to email worms.
